abstract: Floyd Mayweather Jr will fight Andre Berto in Las Vegas.
lead_paragraph: Floyd Mayweather Jr. will return to the ring for the first time since May, in a bout against Andre Berto on Sept. 12 in Las Vegas.

headline.main: Mayweather to Face Berto in September

snippet: Floyd Mayweather Jr. will return to the ring for the first time since May, in a bout against Andre Berto on Sept. 12 in Las Vegas.
